about_the_game:
There are many useful items in the Cyberpunk dandy set that will improve your game. This set will allow you to enjoy the possibilities that the store offers. You will have a large number of consumables at your disposal, as well as unique wings!

Please note that all items from the Cyberpunk dandy set cannot be stored in a warehouse and transferred to another player.

Remember that you can only buy a starter kit once.

The delivery package includes:

Travel Stone (20 pieces)
Altar Protection Arena Pass (5 pcs)
Altar Guard Potion (15 pcs)
Resuscitator (1 piece)
Wings of sparkling blades (1 piece)
Great Healing Potion [NP] (15 pieces)
Transfer Crystal [NP] (5 pcs)
Teleportation Stone [NP] (15 pcs)

You can get the purchased set in the "Gifts" menu of the in-game store.

name: Sphere 3 - Cyberpunk dandy
short_description: The Cyberpunk dandy set has wings, as well as useful items that will improve your gameplay.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, French, Italian, German, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
